00100000000000010000010001000001 # 0:  ADDI $0, $1, 64    # $1 = 64
00100000000000100000000000011100 # 1:  ADDI $0, $2, 0     # $2 = 32
10101100010000010000000000000100 # 2:  SW   $1, 0($2)     # $3 = 96
10001100010000110000000000000100 # 3:  LW   $3, 0($2)    # $2 += $1
00010000001000110000000000000001 # 4:  BEQ  $1, $3, 1     # if ($4 == $5) goto EOP
00001011111111111111111111111111 # 5: J INF               # Jump out of boundaries
11111100000000000000000000000000 # 6: EOP		          # End of Program
#
00000000000000000111110001000000
00000000000000000010000000000000
